snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selection includes items on how a Facebook stock offering could affect California's budget, Apple's chance to reinvent...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selection includes items on how a Facebook stock offering could affect California's budget, Apple's chance to reinvent manufacturing, eBay's data center and Neil Young's take on record companies and piracy.
lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web on Wednesday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: iFactory Visions and eBay's Data Power
